description: Run a sourcing search to find matching truckers, trailers, and broker tenders.
permissions: Allowed for users who have a broker membership with the broker that owns the customer tender (customer_tender.buyer.broker). If the broker is missing, the policy allows the request but validation will fail.
side_effects: Performs a sourcing search and returns matching results (truckers, trailers, broker tenders).
validation_notes: customer_tender is required and must be an integer ID for a customer tender visible to the current user (policy scope). additional_certification_requirement_types and customer_tender IDs are cast to Integer on the server. If omitted, maximum_distance_miles defaults to 50 and maximum_result_count defaults to 100; additional_certification_requirement_types defaults to empty. The search is executed during create; invalid inputs return JSONAPI validation errors.

flags.name: --customer-tender
flags.validation: Must be an integer ID of an existing customer tender accessible to the current user (policy scope).

flags.name: --maximum-distance-miles
flags.validation: Numeric (float) miles; if omitted, server default is 50.

flags.name: --maximum-result-count
flags.description: Maximum number of results to return.
flags.validation: Integer; if omitted, server default is 100.

flags.name: --additional-certification-requirement-types
flags.description: Additional certification type IDs (comma-separated or repeated).
